lines.value: the production closed june 14 playing 113 shows and 28 previews
lines.name: English

lines.value: it was announced in january 2009 that graham would star in the comedy pilot the bridget show previously let it go for abc playing a talk show host and self help guru who fails to follow her own advice during a breakup
lines.name: English

lines.value: however the pilot was not given a series order
lines.name: English

lines.value: in october 2009 it was announced that graham would replace maura tierney in the television series parenthood as single mother sarah braverman
lines.name: English

lines.value: tierney left the show to seek treatment for cancer
lines.name: English

lines.value: the series debuted on nbc the following year and ran for a total of six seasons
lines.name: English

lines.value: in june 2010 it was confirmed that graham would star in the upcoming scream 4 but she left the project on june 30 2010
lines.name: English

lines.value: in july 2012 graham was a guest judge in the first episode of season 10 of the reality television series project runway
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2015 graham appeared in the adventure drama film max playing the mother of an american marine killed in afghanistan who subsequently adopts his malinois dog
lines.name: English

lines.value: graham said she based her character on her grandparents who had different types of strength and that she felt connected to the film due to many in the film's choir having come from a church her grandfather attended
lines.name: English

lines.value: ignatiy vishnevetsky and joe neumaier felt her role was too limited
lines.name: English

lines.value: the year also saw graham beginning to appear recurrently in the odd couple playing gaby the former wife of the series main protagonist oscar and appear in an episode of the hidden camera comedy repeat after me
lines.name: English

lines.value: graham's first film in 2016 was the comedy drama joshy
lines.name: English

lines.value: jesse hassenger and michael arbeiter noted her small role in the film
lines.name: English

lines.value: in october 2016 graham appeared in middle school the worst years of my life playing the mother of griffin gluck's character
lines.name: English

lines.value: as a result of her own distaste for portions of her youth graham related to the title sparking her initial interest in participating
lines.name: English

lines.value: that year graham also reprised her role as lorelai gilmore on netflix's reunion series gilmore girls a year in the life
lines.name: English

lines.value: graham said she first realized gilmore girls was still the subject of active interest when girls too young to have watched the series when it initially aired approached her during her broadway debut guys and dolls and admitted to crying while reading the script as she believed it was just beautiful and fitting and what i wanted it to be and hoped for graham reflected that the project had more support from the beginning than any other she had been involved with and she continuously teared up out of appreciation for those working on the series and being able to reprise her role
lines.name: English

lines.value: in october 2017 graham appeared in three episodes of hbo's acclaimed comedy curb your enthusiasm which returned after a six year hiatus
lines.name: English

lines.value: she also voices the character oxana hauntley in the disney junior animated series vampirina
lines.name: English

lines.value: graham's debut novel someday someday maybe 2013 was released by ballantine books of random house on april 30 2013
lines.name: English

lines.value: the comedic novel is a fictionalization of her experiences trying to become an actress in 1990s new york
lines.name: English

lines.value: in may 2013 the book entered the new york times best seller list
lines.name: English

lines.value: graham signed a deal with warner bros television and ellen degeneres production company a very good production to adapt it into a tv series
lines.name: English

lines.value: graham wrote the screenplay for a pilot episode but it was not picked up for filming
lines.name: English

lines.value: in november 2016 graham's second book was published a collection of personal essays titled talking as fast as i can from gilmore girls to gilmore girls and everything in between
lines.name: English

lines.value: it was also a new york times best seller
lines.name: English

lines.value: graham has adapted the novel the royal we into a screenplay for cbs films she finished the script in mid 2017
lines.name: English

lines.value: she has optioned the rights for the novel windfall by jennifer e smith graham's book editor
lines.name: English

lines.value: since 2010 graham has been in a relationship with actor peter krause
lines.name: English

lines.value: they first met in 1995 when they both appeared in the sitcom caroline in the city then became a couple while playing brother and sister on parenthood
lines.name: English

lines.value: they live together in los angeles
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the mid 1990s graham was roommates with actress connie britton
lines.name: English

lines.value: graham owns an apartment in manhattan and a house in los angeles
lines.name: English

lines.value: graham remains involved with her catholic faith by occasionally attending mass
lines.name: English

lines.value: she is a registered democrat
lines.name: English

lines.value: sarah louise kerrigan the self styled queen of blades is a fictional character in blizzard entertainment's starcraft franchise
lines.name: English

lines.value: the character was created by chris metzen and james phinney and her appearance was originally designed by metzen
lines.name: English

lines.value: sarah kerrigan is voiced by glynnis talken campbell in starcraft and , and by tricia helfer in starcraft ii wings of liberty starcraft ii heart of the swarm and starcraft ii legacy of the void
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan first appears in starcraft as a twenty six year old terran ghost a psychic trained both physically and mentally as an expert espionage agent and assassin
lines.name: English

lines.value: initially the second in command of sons of korhal a revolutionary movement against the oppressive confederacy of man she is captured by the insectoid zerg and infested turning her into a human/zerg hybrid completely under the control of the zerg overmind
lines.name: English

lines.value: she becomes one of the zerg's most powerful agents but during the brood wars she replaces the overmind following its destruction at the end of the great war and gains control of the zerg to seek dominance over the galaxy
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan's life before her infestation is further explored in the starcraft novels uprising and liberty's crusade while queen of blades elaborates on her infested character
lines.name: English

lines.value: as one of the major characters of the series kerrigan has been critically praised for her believability and character depth
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan is frequently featured in lists of both the top computer gaming enemies and top female characters a survey by gamespot in 2010 declared her to be the greatest gaming villain and complex ranked her as the most evil woman in gaming in 2012
lines.name: English

lines.value: the character of kerrigan was created by blizzard entertainment's chris metzen and james phinney with her physical appearance designed by metzen
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan was not originally intended to be a major character and was only meant to appear on a single level
lines.name: English

lines.value: initially based around the character tanya adams in the command & conquer red alert series kerrigan was named after nancy kerrigan who at the time was involved in a feud with tonya harding
lines.name: English

lines.value: however kerrigan's character grew on the developers who decided to give a far greater role to the throw away character
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan's self proclaimed title is the queen of blades which is gradually introduced to other characters to the point where it is synonymous with her
lines.name: English

lines.value: chris metzen has explained that it was meant to be an honorific title a blade is a weapon designed to rip enemies to pieces making the title fitting for kerrigan who evolved to be the greatest agent of the zerg overmind
lines.name: English

lines.value: in an interview glynnis talken campbell kerrigan's voice actress from starcraft and , described kerrigan's change in personality during her infestation as going from good girl to bad girl and has said it was more of a change in personality than voice when providing her voice work
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan's voice also consisted of many grunts growls and screams and her unique infested voice was provided by doubling up campbell's voice
lines.name: English

lines.value: she has also claimed that were she to pen a starcraft film or novel she would rather have kerrigan's relationship with jim raynor the series primary male protagonist portrayed as one of admiration sacrifice and them saving each other's butts than actual romance due to starcraft s action oriented nature
lines.name: English

lines.value: while campbell expressing interest in returning to voice the character in starcraft ii and even voiced kerrigan in the trailer for the game she confirmed in february 2009 that she would not be reprising the role
lines.name: English

lines.value: campbell stated that her work in the trailer was considered an audition of sorts and that blizzard had decided to go in a different direction
lines.name: English

lines.value: tricia helfer replaced her voicing kerrigan in starcraft ii wings of liberty as well as the expansions heart of the swarm and legacy of the void
lines.name: English

lines.value: having been conscripted into the confederate ghost program as a child due to her psychic potential kerrigan is described in the manual for starcraft as never having been given the chance for a normal life
lines.name: English

lines.value: her rigorous training and the use of neural implants to control her mental abilities leave her withdrawn and introverted
lines.name: English

lines.value: despite this kerrigan exhibits qualities of courage and daring and is an effective tactician
lines.name: English

lines.value: she is also described as a moral character exemplified in her opposition to arcturus mengsk using the zerg against the confederacy
lines.name: English

lines.value: however after her transformation by the zerg kerrigan is freed from her inhibitions as well as her neural conditioning and indulges her darker traits though heart of the swarm implies that at least part of her villainy was due to the influence of a fallen xel'naga named amon
lines.name: English

lines.value: her attitude combined with her natural intelligence makes her extremely calculating and manipulative
lines.name: English

lines.value: a hint of her former moral sensitivity is to be noted when towards the end of the zerg campaign of brood war she states how she feels weary of slaughter for the first time since her transformation
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan has also become far more physically aggressive relishing close quarters combat so much that at one point in the novel queen of blades she begins absent mindedly licking the blood of her victims from her fingers
lines.name: English

lines.value: one of the core elements of kerrigan's personality is that of her manipulation by others and her lack of identity
lines.name: English

lines.value: her reversion to human form by raynor allowed her to finally develop an identity for herself though found her emotions torn between a man that she loved raynor and a man that she despised mengsk
lines.name: English

lines.value: as a character with different incarnations special powers transformations three unique personas and ultimate amalgamation of four separate alien species kerrigan gains multiple aspects and aliases as the series progresses
lines.name: English

lines.value: prior to her infestation kerrigan is described as being a graceful and deadly woman exceedingly agile and athletic possessing jade green eyes and brilliant red hair usually worn as a ponytail
lines.name: English

lines.value: the novel queen of blades describes her facial features as being too strong to be classified as beautiful but instead as striking and completely fitting for her personality
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan is rarely seen out of her armor a form fitting hostile environment suit specifically designed for ghost operatives and equipped with a personal cloaking device but when off duty she is described as wearing a soft work shirt worn cotton pants with a dusty leather jacket and high leather boots
lines.name: English

lines.value: even then it is uncommon for kerrigan to be unarmed she is always equipped with at least a combat knife
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan's infestation by the zerg signaled a major overhaul for her appearance
lines.name: English

lines.value: despite maintaining her stature build and facial features she is described in queen of blades as having mottled green skin covered in a glossy protective carapace
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan's eyes are bright yellow as opposed to her natural green and her hair has transformed into stalks described as being segmented like an insect's legs
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan's fingers are stated to now contain extendible claws
lines.name: English

lines.value: a pair of skeletal wings has also grown from her back consisting of elongated segmented spikes that reach down to the level of her knees
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan is seen using these wings as a melee weapon tearing opponents apart
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan ascended into xel'naga form by consuming the essence of ouros the last remaining xel'naga marking a complete overhaul for her appearance
lines.name: English

lines.value: her physique resembles that of her human form though her skin turns a metallic gold color with flames dancing along the surface
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the legacy of the void epilogue cutscene a bokeh image of kerrigan in her human form wearing her ghost armor is seen by jim raynor
lines.name: English

lines.value: sarah kerrigan appears in starcraft the great war halfway through the first chapter of the game
lines.name: English

lines.value: she and confederate officer jim raynor are tasked by arcturus mengsk the leader of the militant rebel group sons of korhal with starting a revolution on the fringe colony world of antiga prime by assassinating the presiding officers of the ruling confederacy of man
lines.name: English

lines.value: in response the confederacy blockades the planet as the insectoid zerg swarm begin to invade the surface and mengsk orders a skeptical kerrigan to plant a psi emitter stolen confederate technology that attracts zerg to it to lure the zerg into breaking the blockade allowing the sons of korhal to escape
lines.name: English

lines.value: the sons of korhal then directly attack the confederate capital world tarsonis
lines.name: English

lines.value: during the attack mengsk without consulting his officers uses the psi emitters to ensure the complete destruction of the planet by the zerg
lines.name: English

lines.value: the zerg are subsequently attacked by the protoss a race of psionic aliens who attempt to stop further zerg advancement and conquest
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan is sent with a detachment of troops to stop the protoss from interfering with the zerg rampage but her position is overrun by the zerg and she is abandoned by mengsk
lines.name: English

lines.value: she was eventually captured for infestation after she ran out of ammo
lines.name: English

lines.value: as raynor deserts mengsk in disgust kerrigan is presumed dead
lines.name: English

lines.value: however kerrigan does not perish and as the second chapter begins the player is charged by the zerg hive mind the overmind to protect a chrysalis it claims will be its greatest creation
lines.name: English

lines.value: the chrysalis eventually hatches on the zerg world char to reveal kerrigan having been infested with zerg dna making her a powerful hybrid of both zerg and terran genetics
lines.name: English

lines.value: raynor drawn to char by psychic dreams cast by kerrigan during her incubation fails in an attempt to rescue her but is spared as kerrigan does not see him as a threat and possibly due to any lingering affection she had for him
lines.name: English

lines.value: after breaking into a terran science vessel and reversing the neural conditioning from her training as a psionic agent kerrigan is able to sense the presence of the protoss fleet commander tassadar on char
lines.name: English

lines.value: tassadar diverts kerrigan's attention long enough for his companion zeratul to assassinate zasz one of the zerg commanders with psionic energies the zerg are unfamiliar with
lines.name: English

lines.value: this causes a temporary mental link between zeratul and the overmind who uses this momentary contact with zeratul's memories to locate the protoss homeworld aiur
lines.name: English

lines.value: the overmind immediately launches the bulk of the zerg swarm in an invasion although kerrigan remains behind on char to hunt down tassadar and zeratul
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan's character is more central to starcraft brood war 1998 as in the wake of the overmind's death at the hands of tassadar in the conclusion of starcraft kerrigan regains her independence from the zerg hive mind and dedicates her efforts to becoming the sole leader of the zerg swarm
lines.name: English

lines.value: she presents herself on the protoss colony world shakuras where she informs zeratul and the protoss of a new overmind growing on char manipulating them into destroying zerg forces running rival to her goals
lines.name: English

lines.value: she also gains an ally in an apparently infested samir duran who infiltrates the newly arrived forces of the united earth directorate ued and attempts to sabotage their mission to enslave the zerg and seize control of the sector of the galaxy
lines.name: English

lines.value: however the ued is successful in capturing the new overmind and kerrigan exploits the threat of the ued to forge an alliance with mengsk raynor and his new protoss allies turning around the war against the ued
lines.name: English

lines.value: however kerrigan quickly betrays this alliance and strikes at the armies of raynor and mengsk heavily damaging both groups
lines.name: English

lines.value: accompanied by duran kerrigan returns to shakuras to abduct the protoss leader raszagal using her to blackmail zeratul into killing the new overmind on char after which all zerg fall under kerrigan's control around this time she begins her self proclamation as the queen of blades
lines.name: English

lines.value: zeratul attempts to rescue raszagal but kills her when he realizes her mind has been destroyed by kerrigan's brainwashing
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan surprised by his actions allows him to live
lines.name: English

lines.value: soon after kerrigan's position on char is attacked by a vengeful protoss fleet the remnants of the ued's invasion force and a mercenary fleet commanded by mengsk
lines.name: English

lines.value: despite being outnumbered kerrigan's forces prevail crippling her enemies and eradicating the ued fleet thereby securing a dominant position in the sector
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan returns in starcraft ii wings of liberty 2010
lines.name: English

lines.value: at blizzcon 2007 chris metzen explained that in the years after brood war kerrigan relocated to char pulling back most of the zerg and has since been quiet
lines.name: English

lines.value: she has the power to wipe out all her enemies but has not creating a tense state of peace in the sector
lines.name: English

lines.value: metzen also indicated an interest in exploring if there was any humanity left in kerrigan or if she is beyond redemption in her current state
lines.name: English

lines.value: he revealed that kerrigan's withdrawal has little to do with any suspicion she has of duran who is revealed towards the end of brood war to be conducting secret experiments on creating a protoss/zerg hybrid she does not know much about him but in the time after brood war she is beginning to piece together the puzzle surrounding his motives
lines.name: English

lines.value: at blizzcon 2008 kerrigan made two brief appearances in cinematic trailers one during an attack on a terran city that was captured on video and again in a series of caverns where zeratul was studying ancient runes in the latter kerrigan implies she has been waiting for his arrival
lines.name: English

lines.value: in starcraft ii kerrigan launches an attack on the terran dominion colonies
lines.name: English

lines.value: at first her motives seem to be revenge however later it is discovered that she is pursuing various pieces of a xel'naga artifact of great power
lines.name: English

lines.value: coincidentally these are the same artifacts that jim raynor is pursuing at the request of his recently freed friend tychus findlay and his benefactor the moebius foundation
lines.name: English

lines.value: raynor's forces and kerrigan constantly bump heads throughout this pursuit with kerrigan displaying her now trademark character traits of arrogance and a hunger for power
lines.name: English

lines.value: raynor soon learns from valerian mengsk son of arcturus mengsk and the real face behind the moebius foundation that the xel'naga artifacts he has been pursuing when pieced together have the power to return kerrigan to her human form
lines.name: English

lines.value: at one point zeratul suddenly appears on board raynor's ship and hands to him a crystal containing memories from his recent ventures
lines.name: English

lines.value: the memories on the crystal chronicle zeratul's campaign to discover the truth behind an ancient xel'naga prophecy a quest which leads him to run into kerrigan many times in the process
lines.name: English

lines.value: it is through these memories that raynor learns just how important it is to ensure that kerrigan does not perish for she is the chosen person to help win the coming battle against the protoss zerg hybrids
lines.name: English

lines.value: through zeratul's crystal raynor is also granted the vision of a possible future one without kerrigan where the protoss are rendered extinct shortly after the terrans are annihilated
lines.name: English

lines.value: after seeing this vision raynor mounts an invasion on char in collaboration with dominion forces to eliminate the zerg forces on the planet
lines.name: English

lines.value: the xel'naga artifact releases an energy blast that wipes the zerg infection clean off the planet
lines.name: English

lines.value: when raynor and findlay seek kerrigan in the ruins she is found to have mostly returned to her human form with only her hair remaining zerg like
lines.name: English

lines.value: however raynor is forced to kill findlay when he attempts to assassinate kerrigan under orders from his benefactor who is revealed to be arcturus mengsk
lines.name: English

lines.value: raynor then carries the weakened kerrigan over the ruined battlefield to safety
lines.name: English

lines.value: her next appearance was in starcraft ii heart of the swarm where she is the central character and it tells the story of her further fate and of the zerg swarm as well
lines.name: English

lines.value: once again a human kerrigan is brought by raynor to a secret research facility run by valerian mengsk to determine how much of her skill at controlling zerg remains from her time as the queen of blades
lines.name: English

lines.value: however the facility is attacked by dominion forces and while kerrigan and valerian manage to escape raynor becomes trapped
lines.name: English

lines.value: after returning to look for him kerrigan hears mengsk's announcement that he was captured and executed
lines.name: English

lines.value: to enact revenge against mengsk kerrigan while traveling through the sector to reunite the zerg swarm under her control is approached by zeratul
lines.name: English

lines.value: zeratul tells her to travel to zerus the original homeworld of the zerg where the primal zerg are in a constantly evolving state
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan initially reluctant is convinced after zeratul tells her there she can obtain enough power to move on with her vengeance plans
lines.name: English

lines.value: on zerus kerrigan learns that amon stole a large portion of the zerg from zerus and bound them to a single overriding will making them amon's slaves as part of his plot to destroy both the zerg and protoss and remake life in his own image
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan enters a chrysalis in the first zerg spawning pool and emerges transforming again into the primal queen of blades
lines.name: English

lines.value: she also realizes that amon's lingering taint was partially responsible for the crimes she committed during the brood war
lines.name: English

lines.value: mengsk contacts kerrigan and reveals that raynor was not killed but is held as a hostage instead threatening to kill him should she wage war against the dominion
lines.name: English

lines.value: with help from valerian and raynor's raiders kerrigan manages to rescue raynor but is rejected by him for renouncing the human self that he worked so hard to restore
lines.name: English

lines.value: now in full control of the zerg swarm once again kerrigan launches an attack on the dominion's main world korhal to defeat mengsk
lines.name: English

lines.value: valerian convinces her to permit civilian evacuation
lines.name: English

lines.value: as a result raynor and his raiders reinforce her assault on the imperial palace
lines.name: English

lines.value: confronting mengsk face to face kerrigan is almost killed by the xel'naga artifact before raynor disables it
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan kills mengsk and bids raynor farewell to prepare the swarm for the greatest battle they'll ever face
lines.name: English

lines.value: during the events of legacy of the void kerrigan enters into an alliance with artanis while investigating the xel'naga homeworld ulnar which the pair discover is in fact a colossal space station
lines.name: English

lines.value: some time after artanis's reclamation of the protoss homeworld aiur kerrigan sends a psionic call to raynor and artanis she proposes an alliance to permanently defeat amon since he will only arise again in a few thousand years if he is not dealt with
lines.name: English

lines.value: during the assault of the void by the joint forces of the terran dominion zerg swarm and protoss dae'laam the full context of zeratul's prophecy about kerrigan is made clear only a fellow xel'naga is capable of killing amon and kerrigan is the only one who can ascend to that status
lines.name: English

lines.value: with the remainder of the joint armada kerrigan is successful in killing amon during her psychic backlash in the void
lines.name: English

lines.value: the game's final cutscene is set two years later
lines.name: English

lines.value: raynor is alone in a bar on planet mar sara
lines.name: English

lines.value: without further explanation kerrigan appears in the background out of focus in her human form and ghost armour
lines.name: English

lines.value: she asks jim if he is ready to leave to which he replies jovially hell it's about time jim is seen approaching her as the screen fades to white
lines.name: English

lines.value: text appears on the screen saying that raynor is never heard from again though kerrigan is not mentioned
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan appears in several starcraft novels that greatly expand her backstory before the first starcraft game
lines.name: English

lines.value: the novel uprising portrays kerrigan's training as a ghost assassin from an early age where she is subjected to intense psychological abuse from her confederate trainer lieutenant rumm
lines.name: English

lines.value: when she was a young girl an accident most likely involving her powers kills her mother and puts her father in a vegetative state
lines.name: English

lines.value: consequently kerrigan is terrified to use her psionic abilities and refuses rumm's demands to show her power even when he threatens to kill her father
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan is eventually subdued with mental implants and used as a top confederate assassin until she is rescued by arcturus mengsk
lines.name: English

lines.value: the novels liberty's crusade and queen of blades provide novelisations for kerrigan's actions in episodes i and ii of starcraft respectively
lines.name: English

lines.value: liberty's crusade develops the implied relationship between jim raynor and kerrigan while queen of blades serves to demonstrate kerrigan's complete transformation by the zerg her removal of her inhibitions and morality and its effect on her former love raynor
lines.name: English

lines.value: in addition kerrigan briefly appears in gabriel mesta's shadow of the xel'naga set between starcraft and brood war in which she attempts to secure a xel'naga artifact on the independent colony world bhekar ro but fails when it eradicates her forces
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan is also observed in shadow hunters the second novel in the dark templar saga a trilogy that acts as a precursor to starcraft ii
lines.name: English

lines.value: after sensing a nexus of joined human minds caused by protagonist jake ramsey at the end of the first novel kerrigan sends zerg forces to its location infesting the half dead body of a dominion funded black marketeer ethan stewart
lines.name: English

lines.value: as the attack is the first zerg activity for years it inadvertently raises the suspicions of arcturus mengsk who wonders what could have motivated it
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan has been received positively by critics
lines.name: English

lines.value: ign's review of starcraft drew note to the evolution of kerrigan's character through the story labelling it as unforgettable and describing her transformation as chilling
lines.name: English

lines.value: kerrigan was included among the 50 greatest female characters in the history of video games by tom's games in 2007 which described her personality as amounting to one of the most fascinatingly complex and memorable characters of all time in 2012 she was ranked as 23rd hottest fictional woman of the year by ugo entertainment
lines.name: English

lines.value: at the 2010 spike video game awards tricia helfer won best performance by a human female for her voicing of kerrigan in starcraft ii wings of liberty
lines.name: English

lines.value: numerous video game journalists have ranked kerrigan among the best villains in gaming
lines.name: English

lines.value: a 2010 gamespot poll ranked her as the greatest video game villain of all time and in 2012 complex's hanuman welch considered her the most evil woman in video gaming
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2013 game informer's liz lanier included kerrigan among top ten female villains in video games stating that kerrigan is as brutal as she is misunderstood
lines.name: English

lines.value: while once a skilled psychic terran her captures by zerg leads to her transformation into the queen of blades
lines.name: English

lines.value: with the rare ability to be both merciless and sympathetic the leader of the swarm is an unforgettable villain kerrigan is featured in numerous starcraft merchandise including toys and miniature statues
lines.name: English

lines.value: due to the complexity of kerrigan's infested appearance she is cited as a particularly difficult character for cosplaying though attempts have been praised
lines.name: English

lines.value: dwight schrute dresses as kerrigan for a halloween party on a season 8 episode of the office
lines.name: English

lines.value: bibliography
lines.name: English

lines.value: * sarah kerrigan at battle.net
lines.name: English

lines.value: paul chato is a canadian comedian and world wide web media executive
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was born in 1954 in toronto ontario canada to hungarian parents
lines.name: English

lines.value: paul grew up in the first planned community in north america don mills
lines.name: English

lines.value: graduating from don mills collegiate in 1973 paul went on to graduate from ryerson polytechnical institute in radio television arts
lines.name: English

lines.value: from ryerson he went on to become an art director with kelly's stereo mart and from there joined rick green to form green and chato a two man comedy team
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1979 paul and rick joined up with dan redican and peter wildman to form the comedy group the frantics
lines.name: English

lines.value: apart from his continued association with the frantics paul is the president of your web department formerly electramedia an international web development company
lines.name: English

lines.value: * biography entry from the official frantics web site

lines.value: max heinrich hermann reinhardt nettlau (; 30 april 1865 &ndash 23 july 1944 was a german anarchist and historian
lines.name: English

lines.value: although born in neuwaldegg today part of vienna and raised in vienna he lived there until the annexation to nazi germany in 1938
lines.name: English

lines.value: max nettlau retained his prussian later german nationality throughout his life
lines.name: English

lines.value: a student of the welsh language he spent time in london where he joined the socialist league and met william morris
lines.name: English

lines.value: while in london he met anarchists such as errico malatesta and peter kropotkin whom he remained in contact with for the rest of his life
lines.name: English

lines.value: he also helped to found freedom press for whom he wrote for many years
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the 1890s realising that a generation of socialist and anarchist militants from the mid 19th century was passing away and their archives of writings and correspondence being destroyed he concentrated his effort and a recent modest inheritance from his father on acquiring and rescuing such collections from destruction
lines.name: English

lines.value: he also made many interviews of veteran militants for posterity
lines.name: English

lines.value: he wrote biographies of many famous anarchists including mikhail bakunin elisee reclus and errico malatesta
lines.name: English

lines.value: he also wrote a seven volume history of anarchism
lines.name: English

lines.value: his extensive collection or archives was sold to the international institute of social history in amsterdam in 1935
lines.name: English

lines.value: he lived continuously in amsterdam from 1938 where he worked on cataloging the archive for the institute
lines.name: English

lines.value: the nazis apparently were not aware of this fact so he died there suddenly from stomach cancer in 1944 without ever being harassed
lines.name: English

lines.value: david blyth hanna december 20 1858 &ndash december 1 1938 toronto ontario was a railway executive with the canadian northern railway and the canadian national railways
lines.name: English

lines.value: born in thornliebank scotland he emigrated to canada in 1882 where he was employed by the grand trunk railway
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1896 he joined william mackenzie and donald mann who organized the canadian northern railway cnor in western canada
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was third vice president of the cnor president of the canadian northern quebec railway company and of the quebec and lake st john railway company
lines.name: English

lines.value: after the federal government took control of the bankrupt cnor in 1918 hanna was named president of the reorganized company in september 1918
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was appointed the first president of the board of directors of the canadian national railways in 1919
lines.name: English

lines.value: he retired in 1922 and was appointed first chairman of the liquor control board of ontario 1927-28
lines.name: English

lines.value: sir henry thornton 1871-1933 succeeded him as second president of the cnr
lines.name: English

lines.value: the town of hanna alberta is named after him
lines.name: English

lines.value: the gary southshore railcats are a professional baseball team based in gary indiana in the united states
lines.name: English

lines.value: the railcats are a member of the american association of independent professional baseball which is not affiliated with major league baseball
lines.name: English

lines.value: the railcats have played their home games at the us steel yard since 2002 when the team started as a member of the northern league
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2011 the team became a member of the modern american association
lines.name: English

lines.value: during their time in the northern league the railcats were the only team to ever reach the championship series five years in a row 2005-09
lines.name: English

lines.value: the railcats won northern league championships in 2005 and 2007 and the american association championship in 2013
lines.name: English

lines.value: on january 23 2001 the northern league announced that it had awarded a franchise to northwest sports ventures llc
lines.name: English

lines.value: in june a limited liability company by the name of victory sports group was officially registered in missouri led by michael a tatoian
lines.name: English

lines.value: the city signed a fifteen year lease with the team ownership for the future baseball stadium
lines.name: English

lines.value: in september 2001 the team was officially named the gary southshore railcats drawing its name from both the city's deep history of freight lines and the south shore line commuter train visible over the left field wall at the stadium
lines.name: English

lines.value: the stadium construction was behind schedule forcing the railcats to play their first season entirely on the road
lines.name: English

lines.value: the city of gary paid a financial penalty for failure to complete the stadium on time which helped finance their season
lines.name: English

lines.value: the railcats traveled approximately 12000 miles to play 90 games
lines.name: English

lines.value: despite that railcats manager joe calfapietra was named the northern league manager of the year after his club won 35 games the most ever by a team that played exclusively on the road
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2002 the railcats signed a ten year naming rights agreement with united states steel corporation for the stadium
lines.name: English

lines.value: joe calfapietra resigned as manager citing that he wanted to be closer to home
lines.name: English

lines.value: he later signed with the new jersey jackals
lines.name: English

lines.value: the railcats hired former major league all star garry templeton to manage the team
lines.name: English

lines.value: unfortunately stadium or not the railcats were little more than a pushover firmly stuck in last place
lines.name: English

lines.value: garry templeton returned as coach for another season leading the cats in their worst season in 2003
lines.name: English

lines.value: in june they had a 14-game losing streak which was the longest in northern league history
lines.name: English

lines.value: they completed the season in last place again securing the record for the most losses for a season in northern league history
lines.name: English

lines.value: the railcats announced that templeton would not be offered his job next season
lines.name: English

lines.value: he later signed with the fullerton flyers
lines.name: English

lines.value: before the 2005 season the railcats hired greg tagert as manager
lines.name: English

lines.value: tagert made a number of roster changes and turned the railcats from losers to winners almost immediately ending the first half with a .563 average the first winning average in team history
lines.name: English

lines.value: the northern league all star game was held at the us steel yard
lines.name: English

lines.value: the second half went the same as the first but ended with an upset victory making the worst team in 2004 the 2005 champions
lines.name: English

lines.value: the railcats beat the fargo moorhead redhawks to win the title
lines.name: English

lines.value: tagert returned as manager in 2006
lines.name: English

lines.value: the cats were first in their division second overall for the season
lines.name: English

lines.value: they returned to the championship series to face the redhawks again
lines.name: English

lines.value: this time losing the title
lines.name: English

lines.value: tagert returned for the 2007 season
lines.name: English

lines.value: he proved that he could make the railcats a legacy team
lines.name: English

lines.value: the railcats appeared unstoppable all season
lines.name: English

lines.value: winning first place both halves
lines.name: English

lines.value: the season was fraught with controversy between the alberta teams and the rest of the league
lines.name: English

lines.value: despite this fact the calgary vipers made it to the championship series
lines.name: English

lines.value: the railcats spared the league the embarrassment of having a team that was leaving the league win the championship as the cats beat the vipers
lines.name: English

lines.value: prior to the 2008 season the cats signed tagert to an extended contract to keep him at least until the completion of the 2010 season
lines.name: English

lines.value: patrick a salvi and his wife lindy purchased the railcats
lines.name: English

lines.value: patrick is the managing partner of the law firm of salvi schostok & pritchard pc with the loss of the alberta teams the league contracted to six teams
lines.name: English

lines.value: due to the size the league opted to have a single division full season
lines.name: English

lines.value: tagert again led the cats in a winning season ending in second place
lines.name: English

lines.value: they lost the championship series to the fourth place kansas city t bones who beat the first place redhawks in the playoffs to make it to the series
lines.name: English

lines.value: the cats again proved a force to be reckoned with in the 2009 season as they ended the season in first place yet again and made it to the championship season for the fifth straight season
lines.name: English

lines.value: they lost to redhawks
lines.name: English

lines.value: the 2010 cats finished in fourth place in the northern league their worst place finish in five years
lines.name: English

lines.value: for the first time since 2004 the railcats did not reach the championship series being swept by the redhawks in the league semifinals
lines.name: English

lines.value: on october 13 2010 the railcats left the northern league along with the redhawks t bones and the winnipeg goldeyes to join the american association for the 2011 season
lines.name: English

lines.value: joice teurai ropa mujuru born runaida mugari 15 april 1955 is a zimbabwean politician who served as vice president of zimbabwe from 2004 to 2014
lines.name: English

lines.value: previously she had served as a government minister
lines.name: English

lines.value: she also served as vice president of zanu pf
lines.name: English

lines.value: she was married to solomon mujuru until his death in 2011 and was long considered a potential successor to president robert mugabe but in 2014 she was denounced for allegedly plotting against mugabe
lines.name: English

lines.value: as a result of the accusations against her mujuru lost both her post as vice president and her position in the party leadership
lines.name: English

lines.value: she was expelled from the party a few months later after which she formed the new zimbabwe people first party
lines.name: English

lines.value: mujuru was born in zimbabwe's northeastern district of mt darwin a shona from the korekore language group
lines.name: English

lines.value: as a shona a conglomeration of various tribes with a common sounding bantu language she is of the same language group as vice president joseph msika and president robert mugabe as well as political rivals morgan tsvangirai and emmerson mnangagwa
lines.name: English

lines.value: however they come from different dialect groups with mugabe being zezuru and mnangagwa being karanga
lines.name: English

lines.value: tsvangirai is a manyika from buhera district in manicaland
lines.name: English

lines.value: at eighteen years old mujuru was the only woman who trained in lusaka
lines.name: English

lines.value: after completing two years of secondary education she decided to join the rhodesian bush war
lines.name: English

lines.value: she is said to have downed a helicopter with a machine gun on 17 february 1974 after refusing to flee.the helicopter downing incident has been vehemently denied by war veterans chairman the acid tongued christopher mutsvangwa after her mujuru expulsion from the party other ballistic experts have also questioned the possibility of shooting down a helicopter with such a light weapon as narrated on her story
lines.name: English

lines.value: by 1975 she was the political instructor of two successful military bases
lines.name: English

lines.value: at 21 mujuru was camp commander at chimoio military and refugee camp in mozambique
lines.name: English

lines.value: she took the nom de guerre teurai ropa spill blood and then rose to become one of the first women commanders in mugabe's zanla forces
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1977 she married solomon mujuru known then as rex nhongo deputy commander in chief of zanla
lines.name: English

lines.value: that same year she became the youngest member of the central committee a member of the national executive
lines.name: English

lines.value: her political activity made her a target for the rhodesian security forces which tried to capture her but were unsuccessful
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1978 when her camp came under attack muruji nine months pregnant at the time was still an active combatant
lines.name: English

lines.value: she gave birth only days later
lines.name: English

lines.value: upon return from the war little was known of the origins of her name and her real name
lines.name: English

lines.value: her mother in an interview for the sunday mail newspaper at her rural mount darwin home spoke exclusively to journalist and media anthropologist robert mukondiwa to whom she revealed that joice was a name she had also adopted during her time away at the war
lines.name: English

lines.value: her actual name he was told was runaida which had been her late paternal aunt's name
lines.name: English

lines.value: the mujurus now live on a requisitioned farm alamein farm south of harare which has been found by the supreme court in zimbabwe to have been illegally seized from the farm owner
lines.name: English

lines.value: at independence in 1980 mujuru became the youngest cabinet minister in the cabinet taking the portfolio of sports youth and recreation
lines.name: English

lines.value: she fitted secondary school in between her busy schedule after she was appointed minister
lines.name: English

lines.value: as minister of telecommunications she tried to stop strive masiyiwa from establishing his independent cellphone network econet
lines.name: English

lines.value: masiyiwa had been given an ultimatum by the cabinet to sell his imported equipment to his rivals
lines.name: English

lines.value: on 24 march 1997 mujuru decided to issue zimbabwe's second cellular telephone licence to the previously unknown zairois consortium telecel cutting out masiyiwa
lines.name: English

lines.value: the zairois consortium included her husband solomon and president robert mugabe's nephew leo
lines.name: English

lines.value: after many legal fights masiyiwa won his licence in december 1997
lines.name: English

lines.value: the zanu pf women's league resolved at its annual conference held in september 2004 to put forward a female candidate for the party's vice presidency a position left vacant following the death of simon muzenda
lines.name: English

lines.value: mugabe bowed to pressure from a zanu pf faction led by mujuru's husband general solomon mujuru to give a woman the second vice presidency post effectively sidelining speaker of parliament emmerson mnangagwa widely seen as his favoured heir
lines.name: English

lines.value: this zanu pf reshuffle was dubbed the night of the long knives by the zimbabwe broadcasting corporation
lines.name: English

lines.value: mujuru was sworn in as vice president of zimbabwe on 6 december 2004
lines.name: English

lines.value: mujuru was nominated as zanu pf's candidate for the house of assembly seat from mt darwin west in the march 2008 parliamentary election
lines.name: English

lines.value: according to official results she won the seat by an overwhelming margin receiving 13236 votes against 1792 for gora madzudzo the candidate of the movement for democratic change mdc faction led by morgan tsvangirai
lines.name: English

lines.value: this ran contrary to earlier claims from the mdc that mujuru had lost the seat
lines.name: English

lines.value: after the election she was again sworn in as vice president by mugabe on 13 october 2008 together with msika
lines.name: English

lines.value: she is the subject of personal sanctions imposed by the united states
lines.name: English

lines.value: she currently lives on alamein farm a productive and high value operation illegally requisitioned as part of the land reform programme from guy watson smith in 2001 as found by the zimbabwe high court and international courts
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2001 the mujuru family became the subject of the first legal action against any member of mr mugabe's inner circle implicated in the illegal seizure of land and assets
lines.name: English

lines.value: the seizure of alamein farm was ruled illegal by the supreme court of zimbabwe
lines.name: English

lines.value: mujuru was considered a potential successor to president mugabe competing against emmerson mnangagwa
lines.name: English

lines.value: she rallied support among the politburo central committee and the presidium and the provincial party chairs
lines.name: English

lines.value: she also garnered support from the general zimbabwean population indicated by the election of her loyalists to the youth league
lines.name: English

lines.value: however her succession was expected to be challenged at the december 2014 congress where the members of all politburo and central committee cadres were expected to seek reelection
lines.name: English

lines.value: in late 2014 mujuru was accused of plotting against mugabe and became an outcast within zanu pf
lines.name: English

lines.value: she lost her positions in the party leadership at the december 2014 congress and shortly afterward on 8 december 2014 mugabe dismissed her from her post as vice president along with ministers who were identified with her faction
lines.name: English

lines.value: in comments published on 9 december the same day the dismissals were announced mujuru said that the claims that she had plotted against mugabe were ridiculous
lines.name: English

lines.value: on 10 december 2014 mugabe appointed mujuru's long time rival in the succession battle emmerson mnangagwa to replace her as vice president
lines.name: English

lines.value: mujuru was expelled from zanu pf on 3 april 2015 and subsequently moved on to form the zimbabwe people first party in opposition to zanu pf
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2017 after expelling seven senior members of the zimbabwe people first party she changed its name to national people's party when the expelled members challenged ownership of the zimbabwe people first name
lines.name: English

lines.value: joice mujuru has recently signed an alliance with 20 smaller parties
lines.name: English

lines.value: this is believed to be a counter to tsvangirai's mdc alliance that is to give her a large bargaining power on the coalition table
lines.name: English

lines.value: the tendai biti led people's democratic party pdp dumiso dabengwa's zapu and the national people's party npp led by former vice president joice mujuru unveiled a coalition pact to challenge zanu pf in matabeleland in the 2018 elections.the zapu npp and pdp leadership said they would not contest each other for any parliamentary seats in matabeleland before noting that doors were still open for a broader coalition with other opposition parties raising fears that the mdc alliance which was announced recently could have hit turbulence
lines.name: English

lines.value: joice mujuru was implicated in a 2009 attempted sale of up to 3.5 tonnes of gold from the democratic republic of the congo to a european company in contravention of european union sanctions on the part of that company
lines.name: English

lines.value: on off keying ook denotes the simplest form of amplitude shift keying ask modulation that represents digital data at the presence or absence of a carrier wave
lines.name: English

lines.value: in its simplest form the presence of a carrier for a specific duration represents a binary one while its absence for the same duration represents a binary zero
lines.name: English

lines.value: some more sophisticated schemes vary these durations to convey additional information
lines.name: English

lines.value: it is analogous to unipolar encoding line code
lines.name: English

lines.value: on off keying is most commonly used to transmit morse code over radio frequencies referred to as cw continuous wave operation although in principle any digital encoding scheme may be used
lines.name: English

lines.value: ook has been used in the ism bands to transfer data between computers for example
lines.name: English

lines.value: ook is more spectrally efficient than frequency shift keying but more sensitive to noise when using a regenerative receiver or a poorly implemented superheterodyne receiver
lines.name: English

lines.value: for a given data rate the bandwidth of a bpsk binary phase shift keying signal and the bandwidth of ook signal are equal
lines.name: English

lines.value: in addition to rf carrier waves ook is also used in optical communication systems e.g irda
lines.name: English

lines.value: in aviation some possibly unmanned airports have equipment that let pilots key their vhf radio a number of times in order to request an automatic terminal information service broadcast or turn on runway lights
lines.name: English

lines.value: * unipolar encoding
lines.name: English

lines.value: *[http://www.maximintegrated.com/app-notes/index.mvp/id/4439 application note i'm ook
lines.name: English

lines.value: you're ook?]

lines.value: southlink is an australian bus service operator in adelaide
lines.name: English

lines.value: it operates services as part of the adelaide metro network under contract to the government of south australia
lines.name: English

lines.value: it is a subsidiary of keolis downer
lines.name: English

lines.value: in april 2000 southlink commenced operating the adelaide metro outer south services with 82 buses under contract to the government of south australia
lines.name: English

lines.value: in april 2005 southlink commenced operating the outer north contract that had previously been run by serco
lines.name: English

lines.value: in july 2011 southlink commenced an eight year contract with an optional four year extension exercisable if performance criteria is met for the outer north and outer south areas
lines.name: English

lines.value: it also commenced operating the hills area services that had been operated by transitplus
lines.name: English

lines.value: as at february 2018 the fleet consisted of 350 buses
lines.name: English

lines.value: southlink operate depots in aldgate seaford pooraka elizabeth lonsdale and mount barker

lines.value: ulriken is the highest of the seven mountains de syv fjell that surround bergen norway
lines.name: English

lines.value: it has an altitude of 643 metres above sea level
lines.name: English

lines.value: ulriken has an aerial tramway ulriksbanen that can bring people to the top
lines.name: English

lines.value: at the top there is a tv tower a restaurant and free telescopes
lines.name: English

lines.value: the cable car was closed as of january 2006 due to the operating company failing to meet government requirements for documentation but it reopened later in the spring of the same year
lines.name: English

lines.value: it was later closed again but it reopened for business on may 1 2009
lines.name: English

lines.value: an area of the mountain is called montana
lines.name: English

lines.value: the mountain was featured in a music video by alan walker alone
lines.name: English

lines.value: there is a network of trails to climb ulriken
lines.name: English

lines.value: the no 12 bus from bergen stops at montana from where it is a short walk to the path up ulriken
lines.name: English

lines.value: it is a popular hike and there are several paths up ranging from steep to not so steep though a little scrambling is involved

lines.value: there are signposts along the way

lines.value: the path is rocky and slippery in wet weather

lines.value: alpha cephei a cephei abbreviated alpha cep a cep also named alderamin is a second magnitude star in the constellation of cepheus near the northern pole
lines.name: English

lines.value: the star is relatively close to earth at 49 light years ly
lines.name: English

lines.value: a cephei latinised to alpha cephei is the star's bayer designation
lines.name: English

lines.value: it has a flamsteed designation of 5 cephei
lines.name: English

lines.value: it bore the traditional name alderamin a contraction of the arabic phrase الذراع اليمين al dhira al yamin meaning the right arm
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2016 the international astronomical union organized a working group on star names wgsn to catalog and standardize proper names for stars
lines.name: English

lines.value: the wgsn's first bulletin of july 2016 included a table of the first two batches of names approved by the wgsn which included alderamin for this star
lines.name: English

lines.value: with a declination in excess of 62 degrees north alderamin is mostly visible to observers in the northern hemisphere though the star is still visible to latitudes as far south as −27° albeit just above the horizon
lines.name: English

lines.value: the star is circumpolar throughout all of europe northern asia canada and american cities as far south as san diego
lines.name: English

lines.value: since alderamin has an apparent magnitude of about 2.5 the star is easily observable to the naked eye even in light polluted cities
lines.name: English

lines.value: alderamin is located near the precessional path traced across the celestial sphere by the earth's north pole
lines.name: English

lines.value: that means that it periodically comes within 3° of being a pole star much as polaris is at present
lines.name: English

lines.value: this will next occur about the year 7500 ad
lines.name: English

lines.value: alderamin is a white class a star evolving off the main sequence into a subgiant probably on its way to becoming a red giant as its hydrogen supply runs low
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2007 the star's apparent magnitude was recalibrated at 2.5141 along with an updated parallax of 66.50 ± 0.11 mas yielding a distance of 15 parsecs or approximately 49 light years from earth
lines.name: English

lines.value: given a surface temperature of 7740 kelvin stellar models yield a total luminosity for the star of about 17 times the luminosity of the sun
lines.name: English

lines.value: alderamin has a radius of 2.3 times the sun's radius and boasting a mass that is 1.74 that of the sun
lines.name: English

lines.value: like other stars in its class it is slightly variable with a range in brightness of 0.06 magnitude and is listed as a delta scuti variable
lines.name: English

lines.value: alderamin has a very high rotation speed of at least 246 km s completing one complete revolution in less than 12 hours with such a rapid turnover appearing to inhibit the differentiation of chemical elements usually seen in such stars
lines.name: English

lines.value: by comparison the sun takes almost a month to turn on its axis
lines.name: English

lines.value: alpha cephei is also known to emit an amount of x radiation similar to the sun which along with other indicators suggests the existence of considerable magnetic activity something unexpected though not at all unusual for a fast rotator
lines.name: English

lines.value: this star along with beta cephei alfirk and eta cephei alkidr were al kawakib al firq الكواكب الفرق meaning the stars of the flock by ulug beg
lines.name: English

lines.value: in chinese (), meaning celestial hook refers to an asterism consisting of a cephei 4 cephei hd 194298 eta cephei theta cephei xi cephei 26 cephei iota cephei and omicron cephei
lines.name: English

lines.value: consequently alpha cephei itself is known as (, .).
lines.name: English

lines.value: uss alderamin ak-116 was a united states navy crater class cargo ship named after the star
lines.name: English

lines.value: boleslaw ignacy florian wieniawa dlugoszowski 22 july 1881 - 1 july 1942 was a polish general adjutant to chief of state jozef pilsudski politician diplomat poet artist and formally for one day president of the republic of poland
lines.name: English

lines.value: boleslaw wieniawa dlugoszowski was born 22 july 1881 on his family's estate in maksymowka near stanislawow - now ivano frankivsk the son of boleslaw dlugoszowski and jozefina nee struszkiewicz
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1877 his family moved to a palace on another family estate in bobowa
lines.name: English

lines.value: there boleslaw spent his early life
lines.name: English

lines.value: he attended secondary school in lwow where he was a top student
lines.name: English

lines.value: subsequently he moved to a school in nowy sacz graduating in 1900
lines.name: English

lines.value: subsequently he studied medicine at jan kazimierz university currently lviv university in lwow graduating with high distinction
lines.name: English

lines.value: after these studies he moved to berlin where he spent a year studying at the berlin academy of arts
lines.name: English

lines.value: after completing his degree there he moved to paris where he worked as a private physician
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1911 he was a founder of the association of polish artists towarzystwo artystow polskich
lines.name: English

lines.value: he also joined the riflemen's association zwiazek strzelecki strzelec where he met jozef pilsudski
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1914 he moved to krakow and joined the first cadre company which fought on the austro hungarian side against russia
lines.name: English

lines.value: in october 1914 he became a commander of a platoon of a squadron in 1 pulk ulanow legionow polskich
lines.name: English

lines.value: during the fighting in 1914 1915 he was promoted to lieutenant and after the war he was awarded the v class virtuti militari
lines.name: English

lines.value: in august 1915 he moved to the special group in warsaw
lines.name: English

lines.value: soon he became an aide de camp to jozef pilsudski
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1918 while on a mission to russia he was arrested by the soviet cheka as a member of the polish military organisation
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was freed after several months
lines.name: English

lines.value: as aide de camp of jozef pilsudski during the polish soviet war he helped him organize the vilna operation and battle of warsaw
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was also a commander of 1st cavalry division
lines.name: English

lines.value: after the war wieniawa was awarded many medals including the legion d'honneur cross of valor and cross of independence
lines.name: English

lines.value: in november 1921 he became the polish military attache in bucharest romania
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was associated with making the polish romanian convention which was signed in 1922
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1926 he passed his exams in high war school and soon became a commander of 1 pulk szwolezerow jozefa pilsudskiego - the most prestigious and representative polish cavalry division
lines.name: English

lines.value: he commanded it until 1930
lines.name: English

lines.value: during the may coup he was one of pilsudski's officers
lines.name: English

lines.value: he helped him to organize the coup
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1930 32 he was commander of i cavalry division and for some time of ii cavalry division
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1931 he was promoted by president ignacy moscicki to the rank of brigadier general
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1932 he became commander of ii cavalry division and performed his duties until 14 may 1938
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1938 he was promoted to major general
lines.name: English

lines.value: from 1938 to 13 june 1940 he was the polish ambassador in rome
lines.name: English

lines.value: on 17 september 1939 he was nominated president of poland by retiring president ignacy moscicki
lines.name: English

lines.value: on the same day poland was invaded by the soviet union and he emigrated to paris to perform his new role but was blackballed by wladyslaw sikorski the french third republic and the united kingdom
lines.name: English

lines.value: after the capitulation of france he emigrated to lisbon but soon he moved to new york
lines.name: English

lines.value: many sources do not list wieniawa as president merely designated successor
lines.name: English

lines.value: however according to the then constitution when the president can not execute his powers as when moscicki was interned in romania and it was clear that he would not be released unless he resigned the designated successor automatically became president
lines.name: English

lines.value: after receiving appointment or becoming president wieniawa asked cardinal august hlond to become prime minister
lines.name: English

lines.value: hlond refused referring noteworthy fact to wieniawa as mr president
lines.name: English

lines.value: also in a press statement from president lech walesa's press secretary on 21 september 1994 to dziennik polski wieniawa dlogoszowski was referred to as one of the legitimate presidents in exile
lines.name: English

lines.value: according to some opinions moscicki had meant to pass his office to wieniawa dlogoszowski as caretaker until the office could be assumed by a candidate acceptable to both sanacja and opposition circles general kazimierz sosnkowski whose whereabouts were unknown in september 1939
lines.name: English

lines.value: finally after wieniawa's resignation a compromise candidate wladyslaw raczkiewicz was chosen
lines.name: English

lines.value: wieniawa became polish ambassador in havana but after moving to washington he died by his own hand
lines.name: English

lines.value: some sources state that he committed suicide by leaping from an upper story of a new york city residence but the exact details of his death are debated among historians
lines.name: English

lines.value: martin powell born 19 july 1973 in sheffield south yorkshire england is an english musician
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1991 powell auditioned for the position of bass player in the band my dying bride but was turned down as the band had just filled the position
lines.name: English

lines.value: upon informing the band he was also a violin and keyboard player he was hired as a session musician before becoming the band's permanent violinist and keyboardist
lines.name: English

lines.value: around 1998 powell and my dying bride parted ways and he joined anathema in the role of live keyboardist only to depart two years later
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2000 powell joined the british heavy metal band cradle of filth along with drummer adrian erlandsson and guitarist paul allender after the departure of les lecter smith
lines.name: English

lines.value: the band then went to record the album midian
lines.name: English

lines.value: the following year the band released their transitional mini album bitter suites to succubi
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2003 they released the album damnation and a day using a small orchestra and choral section for which powell wrote the score
lines.name: English

lines.value: powell wrote several songs for both that album and was also a songwriter for the band's 2004 album nymphetamine on which he played guitars on several tracks as well as keyboard duties
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2005 powell and cof parted ways
lines.name: English

lines.value: since his departure from cradle of filth powell returned to university where he earned a first class degree in music and won the phillip john lord composition prize and completed a phd in music composition in 2013
lines.name: English

lines.value: powell is featured on the type o negative dvd symphony for the devil
lines.name: English

lines.value: he played live keyboards for tiamat in 2006/7 he toured with alternative 4
lines.name: English

lines.value: he wrote and played keyboards for the 2013 album when the circle of light begins to fade from australian band the eternal
lines.name: English

lines.value: he also toured as live keyboard player for solstafir in 2016
lines.name: English

lines.value: most recently he played and composed keyboards for the dutch band bleeding gods next album dodekathlon released february in 2018
lines.name: English
