lines.value: osella is an italian racing car manufacturer and former formula one team
lines.name: English

lines.value: they participated in 132 grands prix between 1980 and 1990
lines.name: English

lines.value: they achieved two points finishes and scored 5 championship points
lines.name: English

lines.value: named after its founder vincenzo enzo osella the team began life by racing abarth sports cars in local and national races in italy in the mid 1960s
lines.name: English

lines.value: though relatively successful osella eventually took over the factory abarth sports car program osella expanded into single seater racing in 1974 to further develop his business
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1975 the team entered the european formula two championship for the first time achieving some success with its own car the bmw powered osella fa2
lines.name: English

lines.value: osella continued in formula two in 1976 but financial problems meant that the team was not competitive and withdrew from the championship before the end of the season
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the following years the fa2s were occasionally entered by privateers one of them being the swiss charly kiser
lines.name: English

lines.value: enzo osella tried to make some money by selling a self penned formula three car the osella fa3 with little success
lines.name: English

lines.value: only a few privateers were optimistic enough to buy the simple untested machine which with toyota or lancia engines competed in the 1976 german and italian f3 championships without making any great impression
lines.name: English

lines.value: after this the team concentrated on running in local sports car events during 1977 and 1978
lines.name: English

lines.value: osella returned to the european formula two championship in 1979 with american driver eddie cheever racing the well used fa2 again powered by a bmw engine
lines.name: English

lines.value: the car was good enough to win three races and take cheever to fourth in the championship
lines.name: English

lines.value: this was enough for enzo osella to take the plunge into the cut and thrust world of formula one
lines.name: English

lines.value: while the fa2 was entered on one occasion in 1980 by the italian privateer marco rocca osella squadra corse appeared in the world of grand prix racing with its first formula one machine the fa1
lines.name: English

lines.value: the car was designed by giorgio stirano
lines.name: English

lines.value: powered by ford cosworth dfv it was overweight and aerodynamically inefficient
lines.name: English

lines.value: the car was presented in a blue and white livery with large denim branding on the sidepods
lines.name: English

lines.value: many components were manufactured in house which meant that they were cheap to produce but not always state of the art
lines.name: English

lines.value: the driver was again eddie cheever who was able to finish just one race in whole season
lines.name: English

lines.value: frequently he had to suffer from the massive unreliability of his car
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the following seasons the basic design was changed several times
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the early years most of the work was done by interim designers like giorgio valentini or tony southgate but frequently enzo osella himself also worked on the cars
lines.name: English

lines.value: most of these attempts brought no improvement as high tech solutions could not be financed
lines.name: English

lines.value: jean pierre jarier finished fourth at imola in 1982 where only 14 cars started and scored the first championship points for the young team in a car that was by now dubbed osella fa1c
lines.name: English

lines.value: despite this result neither the financial nor the technical situation improved
lines.name: English

lines.value: few sponsors were attracted by the tiny italian team
lines.name: English

lines.value: denim only stayed for the first two seasons kelemata was no more reliable and others like landis & gyr vanished as quickly as they had come
lines.name: English

lines.value: most of the other sponsors were small or mid size companies from turin or the region of piemont
lines.name: English

lines.value: the lack of funding led to frequent driver changes as the team demanded that their drivers bring significant sponsorship to keep the team afloat
lines.name: English

lines.value: some drivers started their f1 careers at osella such as alex caffi and gabriele tarquini while piercarlo ghinzani had four stints with the team
lines.name: English

lines.value: others disappeared as quickly as they had come such as allen berg and franco forini
lines.name: English

lines.value: enzo osella gave the young austrian jo gartner his one and only chance to drive a formula one car in 1984
lines.name: English

lines.value: riccardo paletti also had high hopes but was killed in a start line accident at the 1982 canadian grand prix
lines.name: English

lines.value: none of these drivers were able to push the team forward
lines.name: English

lines.value: finally osella continued to live hand to mouth each year with little or no improvement in competitiveness
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the mid 1980s osella was the beneficiary of factory alfa romeo engines both in naturally aspirated 1983-84 and turbo 1984-88 forms
lines.name: English

lines.value: on one hand the alfa engine program helped the team to survive the increasingly professional turbo era on the other hand the heavy unreliable and thirsty machines contributed to the team's lack of competitiveness
lines.name: English

lines.value: at least at first alfa offered some technical input to the team the 1984 osella fa1f was based on the 1983 works alfa romeo 183t which had been loaned to the team for design assistance purposes
lines.name: English

lines.value: all the following osella models up to the fa1l in had their origins in the initial alfa design
lines.name: English

lines.value: the alfa turbo engine the 890t was not reliable
lines.name: English

lines.value: chargers blew off regularly and power output had to be reduced down to the level of the non turbo cars just to achieve the necessary reliability
lines.name: English

lines.value: on more than one occasion osella tried to replace the 890t with more up to date motori moderni turbos which minardi did not support or with cosworth engines
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the end both were too expensive so osella had to stick with the increasingly outdated but cheap 890t
lines.name: English

lines.value: for 1988 - the last year before turbos were banned - the team rebranded the 890t as the osella v8
lines.name: English

lines.value: this came about after alfa's parent company fiat grew tired of the negative publicity the team had given the 890t and while allowing them to continue using the engine refused to allow the alfa romeo name to be used
lines.name: English

lines.value: after driver nicola larini managed some impressive times in pre season testing at monza the team were quietly confident of a decent showing through 1988 as many teams had switched to naturally aspirated engines in preparation for 1989
lines.name: English

lines.value: however the reality was that the fa1l with its outdated turbo was not up to the challenge larini often failed to qualify or even pre qualify and was also excluded from the san marino grand prix before practice after failing to get through scrutineering due to illegal changes made to the chassis
lines.name: English

lines.value: at the end of the season enzo osella was more than happy to be finally rid of the old alfa engine
lines.name: English

lines.value: the 1989 season saw much improvement
lines.name: English

lines.value: the all new cosworth dfr powered osella fa1m was a big step ahead and ultra sticky qualifying tyres from pirelli brought some success at least in the qualifying sessions most notably in the japanese grand prix where larini qualified 10th
lines.name: English

lines.value: the fine qualifying performance brought no results in the races the osella cars almost never saw the finish line due to several technical failures
lines.name: English

lines.value: the most tragic race was the canadian grand prix in which larini was third before the fa1m's electrics failed due to water ingress
lines.name: English

lines.value: piercarlo ghinzani rejoined the team for 1989 with limited success often failing to qualify
lines.name: English

lines.value: he announced his retirement at the season ending australian grand prix
lines.name: English

lines.value: while larini failed to start the very wet race when his electrics were water logged on the grid ghinzani's race and career came to a violent end when a high speed collision with the lotus of nelson piquet left ghinzani with an injured ankle
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1990 after ten years in formula one and still without any meaningful sponsorship enzo osella sold shares in his team to metalwork magnate gabriele rumi as part of a sponsorship deal with rumi's fondmetal company
lines.name: English

lines.value: during the team entered a single car for french driver olivier grouillard who gained a reputation in f1 for being a blocker holding up faster cars and ignoring his mirrors
lines.name: English

lines.value: at the end of 1990 rumi took over the remainder of the team and renamed it fondmetal
lines.name: English

lines.value: the involvement of gabriele rumi meant the end of enzo osella's activities in formula one
lines.name: English

lines.value: instead he concentrated on the thing he knew best sports car racing
lines.name: English

lines.value: during his formula one years he never gave up building sports cars in fact this was one of the few projects that regularly brought money to volpiano
lines.name: English

lines.value: a few of those sports cars even found their way to the can am series although without much success
lines.name: English

lines.value: the most prestigious result was during the 1984 can am season with a third place in the championship for the 2-litre class the car was the osella pa10 driven by armando trentini and was the only two seater in the championship the rest of the 2-litre class field comprised single seater f2 cars with covered wheels
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the 1990s osella moved to atella in the south of italy where he built a new ultra modern facility to produce some very competitive sports cars
lines.name: English

lines.value: many of them were sold to privateers while others were entered in several classes by the osella works team
lines.name: English

lines.value: the works team was particularly successful in hillclimb races
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1995 for instance works team driver pasquale irlando won all 9 races of the european hillclimb championship using the osella pa18
lines.name: English

lines.value: he won the title in 1997 1998 and 1999 consecutively
lines.name: English

lines.value: his successor fabio danti died in one of osella's cars when he was competing in the 2000 championship
lines.name: English

lines.value: hillclimb stars like franz tschager and martin krisam continue to use osella cars
lines.name: English

lines.value: nowadays the factory was transferred back near turin in verolengo and continue activity building sport cars for hill climbing and minor sport race championship
lines.name: English

lines.value: brian david griese (; born march 18 1975 is a former american football quarterback and current color commentator for espn college football
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was drafted by the broncos in the third round of the 1998 nfl draft
lines.name: English

lines.value: he played high school football at christopher columbus high school and later college football at michigan
lines.name: English

lines.value: during his rookie year in 1998 he earned a super bowl ring with the broncos as john elway led the broncos to a victory in super bowl xxxiii over the atlanta falcons
lines.name: English

lines.value: elway retired after the super bowl and griese became the starting quarterback for the broncos during the 1999 season
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese was a pro bowl selection with the broncos in 2000
lines.name: English

lines.value: after leaving the broncos he started at quarterback for the miami dolphins 5 games in 2003 chicago bears 13 games in 2006 and 2007 and tampa bay buccaneers 21 games in 2004 2005 2008
lines.name: English

lines.value: he is the son of hall of fame quarterback bob griese
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese was born in miami florida and attended christopher columbus high school in miami playing football basketball and golf
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese played college football at the university of michigan from 1993 to 1997
lines.name: English

lines.value: michigan did not offer him a scholarship so he walked on to the football team
lines.name: English

lines.value: he turned down scholarship offers from purdue and kentucky
lines.name: English

lines.value: after he was redshirted in 1993 and limited to placeholding duties in 1994 griese took over as the starting quarterback after scott dreisbach was injured five games into the 1995 season
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese started for the remainder of the 1995 season capped by an upset of 2 ranked ohio state 31–23
lines.name: English

lines.value: at the beginning of the 1996 season dreisbach regained his starting job and griese returned to the bench serving as the team's pooch punter
lines.name: English

lines.value: however after dreisbach struggled griese replaced him at halftime against ohio state where he led the wolverines to another upset victory over the buckeyes 13–9
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese finished the season starting in a 17–14 loss to alabama in the outback bowl
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 1997 griese remained the starter
lines.name: English

lines.value: along with heisman trophy winner charles woodson he led the wolverines to an undefeated season and a share of the national championship
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese was selected as the mvp of the 1998 rose bowl passing for 251 yards and three touchdowns in michigan's win over washington state
lines.name: English

lines.value: in his michigan career griese had a 17–5 record as a starter
lines.name: English

lines.value: the wolverines won all three games against ohio state in which he quarterbacked
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was inducted into the rose bowl hall of fame on december 30 2012
lines.name: English

lines.value: the denver broncos selected griese in the third round of the 1998 nfl draft
lines.name: English

lines.value: he began his career as a third string back up to bubby brister and john elway
lines.name: English

lines.value: he became a super bowl champion in 1998 though he spent most of the season on the sidelines
lines.name: English

lines.value: following elway's retirement in 1999 griese became the broncos starting quarterback
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese earned a 75.6 passer rating during his first season as starter but improved the next year raising it to 102.9
lines.name: English

lines.value: his efforts merited him an invite to the 2000 pro bowl
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese consistently completed a high percentage of his passes
lines.name: English

lines.value: he has had four seasons with a better than 64% completion rate including one year 2004 when he completed 69.3% of his passes
lines.name: English

lines.value: nevertheless he was unable to establish himself as one of the elite quarterbacks of the league due to injuries and a penchant for interceptions
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was released by the broncos following the 2002 season and was replaced by former cardinals starter jake plummer
lines.name: English

lines.value: in june 2003 he signed with the miami dolphins
lines.name: English

lines.value: his stint with the dolphins where his father bob griese played his entire 14-year career was brief being released in february 2004
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese was given the starting job when the dolphins starting quarterback jay fiedler got injured
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese had an excellent start as a dolphin passing for 3 touchdowns and 0 interceptions in a blowout victory against san diego
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese signed with and performed well for the tampa bay buccaneers and provided a catalyst for the jumpstart of the tampa offense
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese helped them to their only victories in 2004 with a 97.5 qb rating and to a 5–1 record in 2005 before succumbing to a torn acl
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese was cut by the buccaneers in 2006 after the injury to his knee in order to free up money for the salary cap
lines.name: English

lines.value: on march 21 2006 he signed a five year contract with the chicago bears
lines.name: English

lines.value: after signing with the bears griese saw limited action
lines.name: English

lines.value: though he fared better than rex grossman during the 2006 preseason coach lovie smith decided to keep griese as the bears second string quarterback
lines.name: English

lines.value: he took late fourth quarter snaps at the end of major victories
lines.name: English

lines.value: though grossman started every bears game in the 2006 season smith allowed griese some extended gametime during week fifteen after the bears had clinched home field advantage throughout the playoffs
lines.name: English

lines.value: in a game against the detroit lions griese completed six of nine passes for 51 yards which set up several game winning robbie gould field goals
lines.name: English

lines.value: smith called on griese to relieve a struggling grossman for the second half of the final regular season game against the green bay packers
lines.name: English

lines.value: however griese did not fare a lot better completing 5 of 15 passes for 124 yards one touchdown and two interceptions
lines.name: English

lines.value: while some chicagoans questioned grossman's ability to lead the bears to the super bowl smith stood by grossman and declared him the team's starter throughout the playoffs
lines.name: English

lines.value: the bears went on to win the 2006 nfc championship but lost super bowl xli to the indianapolis colts
lines.name: English

lines.value: after grossman struggled during the first three outings of the 2007 chicago bears season smith turned to griese to lead the team
lines.name: English

lines.value: in his first outing as a bears starter griese threw two touchdowns and three interceptions in a losing effort against the detroit lions
lines.name: English

lines.value: the next week he led the bears on a game winning drive against the philadelphia eagles in which he called the plays due to a headset failure
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese lost the starting job to grossman after sustaining an injury against the oakland raiders during week ten
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese again replaced grossman later in the season after grossman sustained a knee injury against the washington redskins
lines.name: English

lines.value: however with the bears out of the playoffs kyle orton started the remaining 3 games of the season
lines.name: English

lines.value: on march 3 2008 griese was traded to the tampa bay buccaneers in exchange for a sixth round pick in the 2009 draft
lines.name: English

lines.value: he started the second game of the season a home game against the atlanta falcons which the buccaneers won 24-9
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese completed 18 of 31 passes throwing for 160 yards with one touchdown
lines.name: English

lines.value: the next week griese played his old team the chicago bears and despite throwing 3 interceptions he threw for 407 yards and 2 touchdowns to help the tampa bay buccaneers beat the chicago bears 27–24 in overtime on september 21 2008
lines.name: English

lines.value: he also started the following week and again despite throwing 3 interceptions he completed 15 of 30 passes for 149 yards 1 touchdown and lead the bucs to a victory over the green bay packers 30–21
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese found himself starting against the atlanta falcons again on december 14 2008 subbing for jeff garcia who was sidelined with a calf injury
lines.name: English

lines.value: he completed 26 of 37 passes for 269 yards and threw 1 touchdown
lines.name: English

lines.value: but griese also threw an interception and was sacked four times in all
lines.name: English

lines.value: the bucs ended up losing the game in overtime 13–10
lines.name: English

lines.value: his career starting for tampa bay was 8–2
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was released on july 13 2009
lines.name: English

lines.value: after his release griese decided to retire from football
lines.name: English

lines.value: since 2009 griese has been employed by espn working as an analyst on the network's college football coverage
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese also served as radio color commentator for 850 koa am)'s coverage of denver broncos football from 2010 2011
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese was a member of the phi gamma delta fraternity and received his bachelor's degree in an individualized concentration from michigan in 1997
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese is founder and board president of judi's house a children's grief support center in denver colorado
lines.name: English

lines.value: brian's mother judi griese succumbed to breast cancer when brian was 12
lines.name: English

lines.value: the grieving process was hard for brian and so he established judi's house to serve grieving children in the denver area
lines.name: English

lines.value: he also helped establish what would become the griese hutchinson and woodson champions for children's hearts golf weekend in may 2007
lines.name: English

lines.value: the event benefited the capital campaign for construction of the cs mott children's hospital as well as the michigan congenital heart center mchc which resides within mott
lines.name: English

lines.value: he also remains involved with the from the heart organization a relationship that dates back to his playing days in ann arbor when he would visit mott every week
lines.name: English

lines.value: for his work with judi's house griese was awarded the 2011 patterson award for excellence in sports philanthropy presented each year by the robert wood johnson foundation which celebrates and promotes the selfless service of people within the world of sports
lines.name: English

lines.value: he was named the recipient of the big ten's dungy thompson humanitarian award in 2014 and the big ten's ford kinnick leadership award in 2015 becoming the first individual to be recognized with both of the conference's annual awards
lines.name: English

lines.value: these awards recognize big ten football players that have achieved success in the areas of leadership and humanitarianism after their college careers have ended
lines.name: English

lines.value: brian and his father wrote a book together undefeated (), published in 2000 about their lives through their undefeated seasons and living through the breast cancer illness and death of brian's mother and bob's first wife judi
lines.name: English

lines.value: griese married brook mcclintic a clinical psychologist in the spring of 2004 on the island of st john in the us virgin islands
lines.name: English

lines.value: the couple met while griese was playing for the denver broncos
lines.name: English

lines.value: on april 6 2006 brian and brook had their first child a baby girl they named annalia rose
lines.name: English

lines.value: ecosystem valuation is an economic process which assigns a value either monetary biophysical or other to an ecosystem and or its ecosystem services
lines.name: English

lines.value: by quantifying for example the human welfare benefits of a forest to reduce flooding and erosion while sequestering carbon providing habitat for endangered species and absorbing harmful chemicals such monetization ideally provides a tool for policy makers and conservationists to evaluate management impacts and compare a cost benefit analysis of potential policies
lines.name: English

lines.value: however such valuations are estimates and involve the inherent quantitative uncertainty and philosophical debate of evaluating a range non market costs and benefits
lines.name: English

lines.value: cost benefit analyses and the generation of market value have existed within the economic literature for centuries
lines.name: English

lines.value: however in 1997 robert costanza distinguished university professor of sustainability at portland state university oregon was the first to estimate the worldwide worth of ecosystem servicesbringing new attention to the field of ecosystem valuation
lines.name: English

lines.value: he and his colleagues calculated that such services were worth $33 trillion annually $44 trillion present dollars
lines.name: English

lines.value: despite costanza's fanfare the world bank three decades later that the benefits provided by natural ecosystems are both widely recognized and poorly understood citing the importance of such knowledge to informed policy making in 2007 environmental ministers from the g8 + 5 nations agreed to both publicly call for and begin to undertake the calculation of global ecosystem benefits conservation costs and the opportunity costs of developing such ecosystems
lines.name: English

lines.value: the resulting watershed initiative and ongoing project is the economics of ecosystems and biodiversity teeb).in the united states the president's council on science and technology suggested in 2011 that the us government should institute and fund a quadrennial ecosystems services trends quest assessment that studying trends in ecosystem performance quality and value
lines.name: English

lines.value: ecosystem valuation attempts to capture the range of benefits and costs contained within a complicated natural web with a range of economic methodologies
lines.name: English

lines.value: ecological systems provide four general categories of services provisioning e.g fish to eat timber to sell regulatory supporting and cultural e.g ecosystems supporting indigenous gathering techniques or supplies for traditional clothing
lines.name: English

lines.value: see figure 1
lines.name: English

lines.value: for a mangrove specific example of this complex subject
lines.name: English

lines.value: these four types of services can then provide two basic categories of value the use and use and non use categories
lines.name: English

lines.value: environmental economists have further separated categorizes for which individuals are willing to pay
lines.name: English

lines.value: while the literature is still emerging many important studies have resulting in striking valuations
lines.name: English

lines.value: one academic paper by de groot et
lines.name: English

lines.value: al which synthesized more than 300 scholarly works collectively evaluating the 10 main biomes shows that the total value of ecosystem services is considerable and ranges between 490 int$/year for the total bundle of ecosystem services that can potentially be provided by an average hectare of open oceans to almost 350000 int$/year for the potential services of an average hectare of coral reefs this potential benefit can take many forms depending on the degree of exploitation and such exploitation's sustainability but can result for example in large ecotourist revenues for local communities protection from storm destruction or profit for an international lumber company
lines.name: English

lines.value: furthermore de groot et
lines.name: English

lines.value: al find that most of their paper's calculated value is outside the market and best considered as non tradable public benefits
lines.name: English

lines.value: the continued over exploitation of ecosystems thus comes at the expense of the livelihood of the poor and future generations the economics of ecosystems and biodiversity teeb in one of its first large cumulative reports also found that ecosystem services start at roughly $100/hectare/year for open ocean and top off to more than $1000000/hectare/year for the most lucrative coral reefs
lines.name: English

lines.value: beyond biome price tags these environmental valuations can explore quite complex policy questions
lines.name: English

lines.value: for example the copenhagen consensus think tank calculated that stemming the loss of coral reefs by 50 percent by 2030 would return more than $24 for every dollar spent
lines.name: English

lines.value: the consensus founder bjorn lomborg explains that coral reefs which both act as fishery hatcheries and fishing resources while storing abundant numbers of species
lines.name: English

lines.value: at the same time coral reefs possess an amazing beauty which both shows up in large tourism revenues but also in most individuals saying they are willing to pay a certain amount to make sure they continue to exist for our grand children
lines.name: English

lines.value: … [programs to preserve 50% more coral reef by 2030] cost about $3 billion per year but the total benefits likely run to at least $72 or about $24 dollars back for every dollar invested as another example the national oceanic and atmospheric administration noaa manages the integrated valuation environmental services and tradeoffs invest natural capital project
lines.name: English

lines.value: this open source tool--although geared towards policy makers advocates and scientists--allows anyone to interact with a map quantifying trade offs between alternative management choices and identifying areas where investment in natural capital can enhance human development and conservation
lines.name: English

lines.value: after and sometimes before evaluating the ecosystem costs and benefits some programs have attempted to internalize those values with specific programs providing payments for environmental services
lines.name: English

lines.value: costa rica paid about $42/hectare for landowners to preserve forests in 2010 norway began paying indonesia a total of $1 billion to mitigate deforestation china responded to 1998 floods with payments targeting deforestation and soil erosion and many other programs large and small
lines.name: English

lines.value: from an academic perspective although scholarly research is quite rapidly adding to this field of understanding many knowledge gaps still remain
lines.name: English

lines.value: for example there is an inherent uncertainty in attempting to quantify non market goods
lines.name: English

lines.value: as pointed to by de groot et
lines.name: English

lines.value: al many environmental goods such as clean air and biodiversity are simply not traded in established markets
lines.name: English

lines.value: in addition many environmental goods may be non rival non excludable and even inseparable goods with multiple value options further complicating any valuation
lines.name: English

lines.value: from an ethical and philosophical perspective too ecosystem valuation is far from uncontroversial
lines.name: English

lines.value: arguments about the non market valuation of ecosystem can be found by referring to environmental ethics and deep ecology
lines.name: English

lines.value: since animals do not put explicit prices on ecosystems they use but do behave as if they are valuable e.g by selecting one territory vs another defending their territories etc it is mostly a matter of definition whether ecology should include valuation as an issue
lines.name: English

lines.value: it may be anthropocentric to do so since valuation more clearly refers to a human perception rather than being an objective attribute of the system perceived
lines.name: English

lines.value: ecology itself is also human perception and such related concepts as a food chain are constructed by humans to help them understand ecosystems
lines.name: English

lines.value: in many cases by those who hold that markets and pricing exist independently of any individual human observers and users and especially those who deem markets to be out of control ecosystem valuation is considered a marginal ignored part of economics
lines.name: English

lines.value: others argue that natural capital is an economic concept that is at least as viable as financial capital which itself is determined on subjective valuation
lines.name: English

lines.value: some even suggest that valuation of ecosystem services is more cogent than financial valuation as the ecosystem would continue after the collapse of the economy while the inverse is not valid
lines.name: English

lines.value: in addition many fascinating questions about where ecosystem benefits go and who should pay for those benefits is an ongoing political debate
lines.name: English

lines.value: in one washington city residents now pay a water bill in order for the town to buy and restore land adjacent to the municipal water source and international examples of evaluating and paying for services is no less a fascinating field of ongoing development
lines.name: English

lines.value: harpers ferry national historical park is located at the confluence of the potomac and shenandoah rivers in and around harpers ferry west virginia
lines.name: English

lines.value: the park includes land in jefferson county west virginia washington county maryland and loudoun county virginia
lines.name: English

lines.value: the park is managed by the national park service an agency of the us department of the interior
lines.name: English

lines.value: originally designated as a national monument in 1944 the park was declared a national historical park by the us congress in 1963
lines.name: English

lines.value: the park includes the historic town of harpers ferry notable as a center of 19th-century industry and as the scene of john brown's abolitionist uprising
lines.name: English

lines.value: consisting of almost it includes the site of which thomas jefferson once wrote the passage of the potomac through the blue ridge is perhaps one of the most stupendous scenes in nature after visiting the area in 1783
lines.name: English

lines.value: due to a mixture of historical events and ample recreational opportunities all within 50 miles 80 km of washington dc the park was listed on the national register of historic places on october 15 1966
lines.name: English

lines.value: the park's superintendent is presently tyrone brandyburg
lines.name: English

lines.value: native american history in the region dates back to at least 8000 years ago
lines.name: English

lines.value: the tuscarora people were the last of the native peoples known to inhabit the area in large numbers essentially vanishing in the early 18th century
lines.name: English

lines.value: one of these european immigrants robert harper obtained a patent for the land from the virginia legislature in 1751
lines.name: English

lines.value: note that prior to 1863 west virginia was still a part of virginia
lines.name: English

lines.value: the town was originally known as shenandoah falls at mr harper's ferry 1763 due to the ferry business robert harper managed and operated
lines.name: English

lines.value: today the original house built by robert harper is the oldest remaining structure in the lower part of the park
lines.name: English

lines.value: george washington visited the area during his trip to the rivers confluence in 1785 searching for a waterway to ship goods westward
lines.name: English

lines.value: later washington began the construction of the federal harpers ferry armory on the site utilizing waterpower from the rivers for manufacturing purposes
lines.name: English

lines.value: meriwether lewis under government contract procured most of the weaponry and associated hardware that would be needed for the lewis and clark expedition at the armory in harpers ferry
lines.name: English

lines.value: blacksmiths also built a collapsible iron boat frame for the expedition
lines.name: English

lines.value: between the years 1820 to 1840 john h hall worked to perfect the manufacturing of interchangeable parts at the armory
lines.name: English

lines.value: utilizing precision molds and jigs this was one of the birthplaces of precision manufacturing so that armaments and related mechanical equipment could be standardized and parts would be interchangeable
lines.name: English

lines.value: subsequently the development of the modern bullet to replace the round lead slug was achieved by james h burton and this improvement was adopted by the us army in 1855
lines.name: English

lines.value: employing at times up to 400 workers the armory produced over half a million muskets and rifles between 1801 and 1860
lines.name: English

lines.value: abolitionist john brown led an armed group in the capture of the armory in 1859
lines.name: English

lines.value: brown had hoped he would be able to arm the slaves and lead them against us forces in a rebellion to overthrow slavery
lines.name: English

lines.value: after his capture in the armory by a group of marines led by us army colonel robert e lee brown was hanged predicting in his last words that civil war was looming on the horizon a prediction that came true less than two years later
lines.name: English

lines.value: the most important building remaining from john brown's raid is the firehouse now called john brown's fort where he resisted the marines
lines.name: English

lines.value: the american civil war 1861-1865 found harpers ferry right on the boundary between the union and confederate forces
lines.name: English

lines.value: the strategic position along this border and the valuable manufacturing base was a coveted strategic goal for both sides but particularly the south due to its lack of manufacturing centers
lines.name: English

lines.value: consequently the town exchanged hands no less than eight times during the course of the war
lines.name: English

lines.value: union forces abandoned the town immediately after the state of virginia seceded from the union burning the armory and seizing 15000 rifles
lines.name: English

lines.value: colonel thomas j jackson who would later become known as stonewall secured the region for the confederates a week later and shipped most of the manufacturing implements south
lines.name: English

lines.value: jackson spent the next two months preparing his troops and building fortifications but was ordered to withdraw south and east to assist pgt beauregard at the first battle of bull run
lines.name: English

lines.value: union troops returned in force occupying the town and began to rebuild parts of the armory
lines.name: English

lines.value: stonewall jackson now a major general returned in september 1862 under orders from robert e lee to retake the arsenal and then to join lee's army north in maryland
lines.name: English

lines.value: jackson's assault on the federal forces there during the battle of harpers ferry led to the capitulation of 12500 union troops which was the largest number of union prisoners taken at one time during the war
lines.name: English

lines.value: the town exchanged hands several more times over the next two years
lines.name: English

lines.value: storer college was built in harpers ferry as one of the first integrated schools in the us frederick douglass served as a trustee of the college and delivered a memorable oration on the subject of john brown there in 1881
lines.name: English

lines.value: subsequent rulings known as jim crow laws led other african american leaders such as dr w e b du bois to hold the second niagara movement an early form of the naacp conference at the school in 1906 to discuss ways to peacefully combat legalized discrimination and segregation
lines.name: English

lines.value: after the end of school segregation in 1954 storer college closed the following year
lines.name: English

lines.value: what remains of the storer college campus is now administered by the national park service as part of harpers ferry national historical park harpers ferry center and the stephen t mather training center
lines.name: English

lines.value: several historical museums now occupy restored 19th century buildings in the lower town historic district of harpers ferry
lines.name: English

lines.value: nearly half a million people visit the park each year
lines.name: English

lines.value: in comparison 15 million people visit washington dc each year
lines.name: English

lines.value: ) north of the park and across the potomac from harpers ferry is the chesapeake and ohio canal national historical park
lines.name: English

lines.value: the canal which operated from 1828 to 1924 provided a vital waterway link with areas up and downstream prior to and during the early years after the arrival of the railroad
lines.name: English

lines.value: today the canal towpath and park which provide access to the maryland heights section of the harpers ferry nhp can be accessed by foot from harpers ferry via a footbridge constructed by the national park service alongside tracks on the railroad bridge over the potomac or via car by traveling east from harpers ferry on us route 340 to access points near sandy hook maryland
lines.name: English

lines.value: aside from the extensive historical interests of the park recreational opportunities include fishing boating and whitewater rafting as well as hiking with the appalachian trail passing right through the park
lines.name: English

lines.value: the park adjoins the harpers ferry historic district as well as two other national register of historic places locations st peter's roman catholic church and the b & o railroad potomac river crossing
lines.name: English

lines.value: in june 6 2016 the harpers ferry national historical park was featured on the third 2016 release of the america the beautiful quarters series
lines.name: English

lines.value: in the middle of the quarter is a depiction of john brown's fort while the outside has the year 2016 location harpers ferry and the state west virginia
lines.name: English

lines.value: this specific coin is the 33rd park quarter to be released in the america the beautiful park quarter series

lines.value: the lower town points of interest are clustered where the shenandoah river meets the potomac river and run along shenandoah street potomac street and high street

lines.value: the population of ford taken at the 2011 census was 12731

lines.value: joint entrance examination - main jee-main formerly all india engineering entrance examination aieee is an examination organised by the central board of secondary education cbse in india
lines.name: English

lines.value: introduced in the year 2002 this national level competitive test is for admission to various undergraduate engineering and architecture courses in institutes accepting the aieee score mainly 31 national institutes of technology nits and 23 indian institute of information technology iiits
lines.name: English

lines.value: the examination originally called sometimes aieee was renamed as joint entrance examination main in april 2017
lines.name: English

lines.value: the aieee was generally held on the last sunday of april and results were announced in the last week of may or the first week of june
lines.name: English

lines.value: post the rename the exam is held in the first week of april
lines.name: English

lines.value: candidates are ranked on an all india basis and on state basis
lines.name: English

lines.value: thus they get an all india rank air and a state rank sr
lines.name: English

lines.value: the examination consists of only two papers paper 1 for b.e./btech courses and paper 2 for barch courses
lines.name: English

lines.value: a candidate can opt for any or both the papers
lines.name: English

lines.value: candidates attempting paper 1 can select one of the two modes of writing the test
lines.name: English

lines.value: 1 pen & paper 2 online
lines.name: English

lines.value: paper 1 has three subject sections mathematics physics and chemistry
lines.name: English

lines.value: each one of the 3 subject sections consists of 30 questions each with equal weightage for every question
lines.name: English

lines.value: all questions are multiple choice objective type questions each of which has four choices
lines.name: English

lines.value: out of the four choices for a given question only one choice is correct
lines.name: English

lines.value: every correct answer will receive 4 marks each and every incorrectly attempted question will receive a negative marking of -1 mark
lines.name: English

lines.value: there is no negative marking applied if the question is left unanswered
lines.name: English

lines.value: paper 2 has three sections mathematics drawing and aptitude
lines.name: English

lines.value: mathematics and aptitude sections have multiple choice objective type questions and the drawing section has drawing based questions
lines.name: English

lines.value: the duration of each paper is three hours
lines.name: English

lines.value: candidates are not allowed to carry any textual material calculators logarithmic tables or electronic devices into the examination hall
lines.name: English

lines.value: the number of questions and their maximum marks have been variable through the years
lines.name: English

lines.value: the questions are based on a syllabus that is common to syllabi of all the state boards in india and the central board of secondary education
lines.name: English

lines.value: candidates can opt for question papers either in english or in hindi language
lines.name: English

lines.value: for admission to btech or be courses in the participating institutes the candidate is required to take the paper 1 for admission to barch or b planning courses the candidate is required to take paper 2
lines.name: English

lines.value: the examination was conducted in offline pen and paper mode till 2010
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2011 as per the orders of the ministry of human resource development cbse conducted paper 1 in computer based test mode for the first one lakh candidates who opted for the same while the remaining students took the examination in the conventional pen and paper mode
lines.name: English

lines.value: the number of attempts which a candidate can avail at the examination is limited to three in consecutive years
lines.name: English

lines.value: , the top 224000 rankers of jee main will qualify to appear for the second and final level of examination jee advanced in 2010 the ministry of human resource development announced plans to replace jee by 2013 with a common entrance test for all government engineering colleges which will be called iseet
lines.name: English

lines.value: accordingly mhrd proposes to set up national testing service which will be an autonomous and self sustained agency to conduct this new common entrance test
lines.name: English

lines.value: for the academic session 2017-18 around 12 lakh candidates appeared in jee main 2017
lines.name: English

lines.value: the number of participating institutes of jee main also witnessed an increase with addition of 3 new iiits and 2 gftis
lines.name: English

lines.value: 23 indian institutes of information technology iiits 31 national institutes of technology nits 23 indian institute of technology iits 20 government funded technical institutes gftis indian institute of engineering science and technology iiest shibpur several other institutes spread across the country the central counselling board coordinates the admissions to the undergraduate courses in the participating institutes
lines.name: English

lines.value: only small percentage of students taking the test are eligible for central counselling or state specific or category specific counselling on basis of their air
lines.name: English

lines.value: counseling for sc/st candidates and sc/st physically handicapped candidates is done on the first two days
lines.name: English

lines.value: then the physically handicapped in the open op category are counselled
lines.name: English

lines.value: as declared by the ministry of human resource development mhrd 50% of the total seats in nits and cftis are offered through home state quota while 50% are reserved for other state quota or all india quota
lines.name: English

lines.value: in other words candidates who qualify jee main and are eligible for admissions into nits and cftis will be offered admission as per home state and all india/other state quota
lines.name: English

lines.value: the number of applicants in aieee 2012 was about 1.2 million in 2011 it was about 1.1 million
lines.name: English

lines.value: according to the number of applicants it is the single day largest exam in the world
lines.name: English

lines.value: institutes participating in the central counselling
lines.name: English

lines.value: the number of applicants taking the jee main has varied over the years
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2016 fewer aspirants registered as compared to the previous three years as shown in the table below.1.3 million candidates appeared for jee main in 2014
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2016 jee main was conducted on 3 april 2016 offline mode and april 9 and april 10 2016 online mode
lines.name: English

lines.value: in 2011 cbse postponed the examination by a few hours after the question papers were leaked in uttar pradesh the night before
lines.name: English

lines.value: meanwhile alternate set of question papers were sent to the examination centres
lines.name: English

lines.value: cbse announced the postponement 30 minutes before the scheduled start of the examination
lines.name: English
